message.content:
Reinforcement Learning, Theory. 

Reinforcement learning is the main focus of the paper, as the authors address the issue of combining function approximation and RL. The paper presents a new function approximator based on soft state aggregation, a theory of convergence for RL with soft state aggregation, and a heuristic adaptive state aggregation algorithm. 

Theory is also a relevant sub-category, as the paper presents new theoretical results on RL with soft state aggregation, including a convergence proof and an intuitive understanding of the effect of state aggregation on online RL.
